name: rxjs-postgres
description: RxJs adapters and decorators for node-postgres

scripts.test:remap: remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/coverage-remap.json && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/html-report -t html
scripts.test:cov: rm -rf coverage && npm run test:compile && istanbul cover _mocha -- -u tdd 'tests-compiled/tests/**/*.js' && npm run test:remap && rm -rf tests-compiled
scripts.test:mocha: npm run test:compile && mocha -u tdd 'tests-compiled/tests/**/*.js' && rm -rf tests-compiled

author: Vladimir Vershinin
